cgcloud__Job_DL_Job_Definition_Template_.name: cgcloud__Job_DL_Job_Definition_Template__c
cgcloud__Job_DL_Job_Definition_Template_.description: This object stores the questions or surveys that are used in the job definition list.

cgcloud__Condition_Answers__c.description: List of relevant answers for the parent condition.

cgcloud__Condition_Description__c.description: Description of Activity Job Definition Template of the parent condition.

cgcloud__Condition_Operator__c.description: Operator that's applied to the Conditional answer.

cgcloud__Condition__c.description: Activity Job Definition Template that represents the parent condition.

cgcloud__Consider_Score__c.description: Indicates whether the question is score relevant.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description of the referenced Job Definition Template.

cgcloud__Excluded__c.description: Used to exclude the activity job definition template from the call execution.

cgcloud__Job_Action_Success__c.description: Controls detachment behavior and validation (mandatory) when completing the call.

cgcloud__Job_Definition_Template__c.description: Reference to the job definition template.

cgcloud__Job_Template__c.description: Job template of the job definition template.

cgcloud__Mandatory__c.description: Respective question or survey that must be answered during the call execution.

cgcloud__Measure_Type__c.description: Measure Type of the referenced Job Definition Template.

cgcloud__Presetting__c.description: Controls the presetting of the corresponding answer in the call.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization to which the job definition template assignment of the activity (and the activity itself) belongs.

cgcloud__Save_Presetting__c.description: Used only in the back end in validations and to control whether preset answers are to be automatically stored when completing the call. Represents the save presetting configuration of the referenced job definition template. As a result, the attribute is pre-populated when adding the job definition template to the activity. On mobility devices, the corresponding job definition template is evaluated directly.

cgcloud__Score_Relevant_Answers__c.description: List of relevant answers for the question.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sorts Job definitions, and is auto-populated from Job_Definition_Template.Sort
